PHP
pages/examples/php.php 		HTML
pages/examples/php.html 		Result
<?php 

  $myData = [
    [ "name" => "joe",   "phone" => "555-3425" ],
    [ "name" => "jim",   "phone" => "555-2364" ],
    [ "name" => "john",  "phone" => "555-7649" ],
    [ "name" => "jack",  "phone" => "555-3422" ],
    [ "name" => "jerry", "phone" => "555-4973" ]
  ];

?> 		<table border=1>
  {myData sort='phone'}
    <tr bgcolor="{switch 'pink', 'yellow'}">
      <td>{$name | ucwords}</td> 
      <td>{$phone}</td>
    </tr>
  {/myData}
</table>
Jim 555-2364

pages/examples/php.html 		Result
<?php 

  $myData = [
    [ "name" => "joe",   "phone" => "555-3425" ],
    [ "name" => "jim",   "phone" => "555-2364" ],
    [ "name" => "john",  "phone" => "555-7649" ],
    [ "name" => "jack",  "phone" => "555-3422" ],
    [ "name" => "jerry", "phone" => "555-4973" ]
  ];

?> 		<table border=1>
  {myData sort='phone'}
    <tr bgcolor="{switch 'pink', 'yellow'}">
      <td>{$name | ucwords}</td> 
      <td>{$phone}</td>
    </tr>
  {/myData}
</table>
Jim 555-2364

pages/examples/php.html 		Result
<?php 

  $myData = [
    [ "name" => "joe",   "phone" => "555-3425" ],
    [ "name" => "jim",   "phone" => "555-2364" ],
    [ "name" => "john",  "phone" => "555-7649" ],
    [ "name" => "jack",  "phone" => "555-3422" ],
    [ "name" => "jerry", "phone" => "555-4973" ]
  ];

?> 		<table border=1>
  {myData sort='phone'}
    <tr bgcolor="{switch 'pink', 'yellow'}">
      <td>{$name | ucwords}</td> 
      <td>{$phone}</td>
    </tr>
  {/myData}
</table>
Jim 555-2364

pages/examples/php.html 		Result
<?php 

  $myData = [
    [ "name" => "joe",   "phone" => "555-3425" ],
    [ "name" => "jim",   "phone" => "555-2364" ],
    [ "name" => "john",  "phone" => "555-7649" ],
    [ "name" => "jack",  "phone" => "555-3422" ],
    [ "name" => "jerry", "phone" => "555-4973" ]
  ];

?> 		<table border=1>
  {myData sort='phone'}
    <tr bgcolor="{switch 'pink', 'yellow'}">
      <td>{$name | ucwords}</td> 
      <td>{$phone}</td>
    </tr>
  {/myData}
</table>
Jim 555-2364
